memberdef.argsstring: (const char *portName, const char *LabviewCmdPort, const char *LabviewDataPort, int maxSizeX, int maxSizeY, int detectorType, int maxBuffers, size_t maxMemory, int priority, int stackSize)
memberdef.name: merlinDetector

briefdescription.para: Constructor for merlin driver; most parameters are simply passed to ADDriver::ADDriver.

detaileddescription.para:
After calling the base class constructor this method creates a thread to collect the detector data, and sets reasonable default values for the parameters defined in this class, asynNDArrayDriver, and ADDriver.
portName
The name of the asyn port driver to be created.
LabviewCommandPort
The name of the asyn port previously created with drvAsynIPPortConfigure to communicate with Labview.
LabviewDataPort
The name of the asyn port previously created with drvAsynIPPortConfigure to communicate with Labview.
maxSizeX
The size of the merlin detector in the X direction.
maxSizeY
The size of the merlin detector in the Y direction.
detectorType
The detector type (Marlin, MerlinXBPM, etc.)
maxBuffers
The maximum number of NDArray buffers that the NDArrayPool for this driver is allowed to allocate. Set this to -1 to allow an unlimited number of buffers.
maxMemory
The maximum amount of memory that the NDArrayPool for this driver is allowed to allocate. Set this to -1 to allow an unlimited amount of memory.
priority
The thread priority for the asyn port driver thread if ASYN_CANBLOCK is set in asynFlags.
stackSize
The stack size for the asyn port driver thread if ASYN_CANBLOCK is set in asynFlags.

briefdescription.para: Called when asyn clients call pasynInt32->write().

detaileddescription.para:
This function performs actions for some parameters, including ADAcquire, ADTriggerMode, etc. For all parameters it sets the value in the parameter library and calls any registered callbacks..
pasynUser
pasynUser structure that encodes the reason and address.
value
Value to write.

briefdescription.para: Called when asyn clients call pasynFloat64->write().

detaileddescription.para:
This function performs actions for some parameters, including ADAcquireTime, ADGain, etc. For all parameters it sets the value in the parameter library and calls any registered callbacks..
pasynUser
pasynUser structure that encodes the reason and address.
value
Value to write.

Prints details about the driver if details>0. It then calls the ADDriver::report() method.
fp
File pointed passed by caller where the output is written to.
details
If >0 then driver details are printed.

briefdescription.para: This thread controls acquisition, reads image files to get the image data, and does the callbacks to send it to higher layers It is totally decoupled from the command thread and simply waits for data frames to be sent on the data channel (TCP) regardless of the state in the command thread and TCP channel.
This thread periodically read the detector status (temperature, humidity, etc.) It does not run if we are acquiring data, to avoid polling Labview when taking data.
sets one of the 6 modes for Merlin versions since Quad Merlin these modes combine sensible combinations of 5 individual settings on the device
Helper function to copy a 64bit profile buffer into a 32Bit NDArray.
Helper function to copy a 8 bit buffer into an NDArray.
Helper function to copy a 16 bit buffer into an NDArray.
Helper function to copy a 32 bit buffer into an NDArray.
Driver for Dectris merlin pixel array detectors using their Labview server over TCP/IP socket.
